transcription: The second flag is up!  and even a single animal is killed in foreign countries. But look at the people in Ghazni, Kabul, Kandahar, Mazar, and Herat. Everywhere people are killed and no one cares. We are affected by the wars and all of this. We are all affected. We are all in pain.  and we are working with the government to bring peace and to end the oppression.
